'''The Incredibles Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|incredibles-skin-pack-out-now|The Incredibles Skin Pack out now!|June 21, 2018|Tom Stone}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] consisting of 42 skins of characters from the popular ''Pixar'' animated superhero film series ''[[wikipedia:The Incredibles|The Incredibles]]''. The skin pack's launch coincided with the release of ''{{Wikipedia|Incredibles 2}}''.
